body_html:
@bingo619 BTW, @orionr's fix for the cuda.framework error didn't work for me. Where exactly did you end up placing the block in the CMakeLists.txt?

OTOH, this patch worked for me:

diff --git a/cmake/Dependencies.cmake b/cmake/Dependencies.cmake
index 2d78f9222..37d03712f 100644
--- a/cmake/Dependencies.cmake
+++ b/cmake/Dependencies.cmake
@@ -399,7 +399,10 @@ if(USE_CUDA)
     # caffe2::cudart is dealt with separately, due to CUDA_ADD_LIBRARY
     # design reason (it adds CUDA_LIBRARIES itself).
     set(Caffe2_PUBLIC_CUDA_DEPENDENCY_LIBS
-        caffe2::cuda caffe2::cufft caffe2::curand caffe2::nvrtc)
+        caffe2::cufft caffe2::curand caffe2::nvrtc)
+    if(BUILD_CAFFE2)
+      LIST(APPEND Caffe2_PUBLIC_CUDA_DEPENDENCY_LIBS caffe2::cuda)
+    endif()
     if(CAFFE2_FOUND_CUDNN)
       LIST(APPEND Caffe2_PUBLIC_CUDA_DEPENDENCY_LIBS caffe2::cudnn)
     else()

(It's totally the wrong way to solve the problem but it might help someone)

body:
@bingo619 BTW, @orionr's fix for the cuda.framework error didn't work for me. Where exactly did you end up placing the block in the CMakeLists.txt?

OTOH, this patch worked for me:

```
diff --git a/cmake/Dependencies.cmake b/cmake/Dependencies.cmake
index 2d78f9222..37d03712f 100644
--- a/cmake/Dependencies.cmake
+++ b/cmake/Dependencies.cmake
@@ -399,7 +399,10 @@ if(USE_CUDA)
     # caffe2::cudart is dealt with separately, due to CUDA_ADD_LIBRARY
     # design reason (it adds CUDA_LIBRARIES itself).
     set(Caffe2_PUBLIC_CUDA_DEPENDENCY_LIBS
-        caffe2::cuda caffe2::cufft caffe2::curand caffe2::nvrtc)
+        caffe2::cufft caffe2::curand caffe2::nvrtc)
+    if(BUILD_CAFFE2)
+      LIST(APPEND Caffe2_PUBLIC_CUDA_DEPENDENCY_LIBS caffe2::cuda)
+    endif()
     if(CAFFE2_FOUND_CUDNN)
       LIST(APPEND Caffe2_PUBLIC_CUDA_DEPENDENCY_LIBS caffe2::cudnn)
     else()
```

(It's totally the wrong way to solve the problem but it might help someone)
